name: Raws x adidas | Through the Stripes |  Special Edition 2023

metadata.name: Raws x adidas | Through the Stripes |  Special Edition 2023 #1/100
metadata.description:
The official Special Edition 2023 digital art collectible by German artist Raws, in collaboration with adidas. This token is exclusively available to adidas web3 community members in attendance at the BERLIN 2023; [    ] VALLEY [     ] event on March 25, 2023.  
The combination of Raw’s signature CHAOS design elements and the iconic adidas three stripes create an unseen alchemy of co-creation and frankly an exceptional work of art.  
Kai “Raws” Imhof is a young, internationally established artist based in Berlin, who deals with the abstraction of urban aesthetic elements, digitalisation and social challenges through combining his past as a graffiti artist with the influences of modern graphic design and contemporary art.  
The central means to this limited edition art piece is the compositional arrangement of all elements seen, with spray cans and the colour world of specific urban movements.  
Raws is a contributing and appreciated community member and long-term holder of the adidas Into the Metaverse NFT, and overall web3 journey.  
Learn more at https://collect.adidas.com/

Terms and conditions: https://a.did.as/collect_tc
